question.title: What is a second-line test for syncope and lipothymia?

option_a.title: Blood pressure monitoring
option_a.description: A test that measures blood pressure to diagnose syncope

option_b.title: ECG monitoring
option_b.description: A test that records the electrical activity of the heart

option_c.title: Tilt test
option_c.description: A test that measures the body's response to changes in position

option_d.title: Endocavitary electrophysiological study
option_d.description: A test that records the electrical activity of the heart from within the heart

correct_option.title: C
correct_option.description: The letter of the correct option
